title: Can I Use Riot Games Music in YouTube Videos?

embed.description: Experience moments woven within the League of Legends universe through soaring scores and victorious anthems. Listen as 15 new and classic League tracks come together for the first time beyond the game. This is the Music of League.

body: Am I able to use riot games music in my youtube videos if they are about riot games - the league of legends? - Just double checking so I don't face a copy right strike or whateve. Was talkinga bout this music in the link above

replies.body:
Because I'm not all lawyer-y myself, I usually direct people to the Riot Legal Jibber Jabber page.  It seems pretty reasonable.

http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber
LOL it's actually titled Jibber Jabber xD
